Many many Thanks for this wonderful movie Sir !
I've already thought you'll skip this one....

Thanks for all these wonderful Imamura releases! I posted a comment on PIGS AND BETTLESHIPS release and got no feedback - am I the only one that's errors on the playback on that movie? Any possibility for a re-release?
Any chance for a reseed on this polifem? Its impossible to find elsewhere :-(
Thanks ! Please keep seeding ive had to start this download from scratch as i had given up hope of a reseed! Thanks a lot
